title: Addicted to Time
description: Charles’s obsession with immortality is well known, as are his methods for achieving it. But what about the side effects? So far, most of them have been positives, for telepathy, mind reading, creating things with his bare hands. Will there be any negatives? Oh yes. And now the entire galaxy is in peril. Author’s To fully enjoy each book in the Time Chain series, please read them in order.
author: Steven Decker
